application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension and a detached outbuilding at the rear of the garden incorporating the enlargement of the existing rear and side roof dormers and a new front porch
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [1104_PL-001; 1104_PL-002; 0014_PL-100 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-101 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-102 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-103 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-105 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-106 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-107 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-104 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-110 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-111 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-112 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-113 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-115 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-116 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-117 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-114 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-130 Rev P-03; Fire Strategy Statement; Design & Access Statement; Flood Risk Matrix; Received: 16/04/2024; 0014_PL-127 Rev P-04; 0014_PL-126 Rev P-04; 0014_PL-125 Rev P-04; Received 26/06/2024; 0014_PL120 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-121 rev P-03; 0014_PL-122 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-123 Rev P-03; 0014_PL-124 Rev P-03; Received: 08/07/2024.]
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.
Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the side dormer hereby approved shall be obscure-glazed and non-opening below 1.7 metres above internal floor level. The windows shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than in accordance with the requirements of this condition. 
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' privacy
Condition : 5 - No additional windows or openings shall be formed in the [insert] elevation of the development hereby permitted.
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' privacy.
Condition : 6 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area.
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' privacy
Condition : 7 - The [detached single storey] outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose incidental to the enjoyment of the house at the 'Site Address' described at the top of this decision letter and for no other purpose (for example, it may not be used as a self-contained dwelling or contain a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen or other primary residential accommodation, nor may it be used for business purposes). 
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' living conditions and the character of the area.
Condition : 8 - The extension hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose ancillary to the enjoyment of the house at the '98 Park Road, Chiswick W4 3HL' described at the top of this decision letter and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes.
Reason: In order to protect neighbours' living conditions and the character of the area.
